casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. David Green (13438)

O’Connell, Heiman and Schaller, Js.

Argued November 28 decision released December 20, 1994 Timothy C. Moynahan, with whom, on the brief, were Cheryl E. Heffernan and Ronald J. Barba, for the appellant (defendant). Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was Michael Dearington, state’s attorney for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
